additional_notes: The document appears to be a handwritten log of observations of inmate Jeffrey Epstein on July 8, 2019. The log includes entries every 15 minutes from 6:00 PM to 10:15 PM, detailing Epstein's activities and behavior. The document has been redacted to remove personal identifying information.
